name: Indignation: Perceptions: Bringing The Roth Novel To The Screen
detailed_description: Go behind the scenes with cast and crew as they talk about the challenges of setting the film in the early 1950’s. Director James Schamus also talks about the assemble cast, and the one scene they found most difficult to depict
